amendment.description: Amendment permits local law enforcement block grants to be used for grants under the Edward Byrne Memorial State and Local Law Enforcement Assistance programs.
amendment.purpose: An amendment (printed as amendment No. 19 in the Congressional Record of February 10, 1995) to permit local law enforcement block grants to be used for grants under the Edward Byrne Memorial State and Local Law Enforcement Assistance programs.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Wise amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.
